text: I'm using Google App Engine and Django Templates.
I have a table that I want to display the objects look something like:

code:
<table>
<tr align="center">
	<th>user</th>
	{% for item in result.items %}
		<th>{{item}}</th>
	{% endfor %}
</tr>

{% for user in result.users %}
	<tr align="center"> 
		<td>{{user.name}}</td>
		{% for item in result.items %}
			<td>{{ user.item }}</td>
		{% endfor %}
	</tr>
{% endfor %}
</table>

text: now the django manual states that when it sees a .

in variables
it tries several things to get the data, one of which is dictionary lookup which is exactly what I want but doesn't seem to happen...
